headline: How Atmos Energy’s Dividend Hike and Safety Spend Will Impact Atmos Energy (ATO) Investors
summary: In recent months, Atmos Energy reported a strong fourth-quarter 2025 earnings result, reaffirmed its 6–8% adjusted earnings growth outlook through 2030, and announced a 15% increase in its quarterly dividend, extending its dividend growth streak to 41 years. The company also highlighted about US$3.60 billion in fiscal 2025 capital spending, with roughly 87% devoted to safety and reliability projects, underscoring its focus on long-term system resilience. Next, we’ll explore how Atmos...
